title: Hey something isn't broken, let's "fix" it!
body:
{{champion:34}} {{champion:245}} {{champion:90}} {{champion:161}} {{champion:8}} {{champion:112}} {{champion:50}} 

Meanwhile {{champion:238}} remains untouched on like 80% ban rate. Let's remove QSS! The balance this season has been absolutely atrocious and I feel like the balance team does nothing all day except for at lunch where they throw darts at a dartboard and they decide to "rework" (see: nerf) whichever champion gets hit by the dart.

replies.body: I'd play against a full team of {{champion:238}} rather than having to meet {{champion:105}} even once.

vlad and swain definitely needed some changes, they havn't changed ekko much (nerfed him a bit), hell ekko is one I would argue that is "broken" and needs fixing.  Velkoz was barley changed (the buffed him, giving q mana refund and passive more intergrated with kit so his ulti does true damage).  I can understand why they changed viktor but I will have to try him out to see if I like the new direction.

Malz certainly didn't get a nerf, that mofo is now way to op with his new passive.
You forgot Brand and Cass in that lineup, bro.
